https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f4idp7yN46Mn5jFzi4676MLkZ6G.jpg After the surprising death of his singing and life partner Charles, eccentric pop star Harry Hansen has lost all drive. Only his neighbor, the widowed surgeon Nicolaus Roeder, cares for him. To finally pull Harry out of his depression, he urges him to hire the unemployed cook Rosa as a housekeeper. Bleib bei mir
